property.name: installation_dir
property.description: Path where this service will be installed.

property.name: config_dir
property.description: Location of configuration files

property.name: wildfly_xmlconf_filename
property.description: default XML file for Wildfly configuration

property.name: wildfly_management_filename
property.description: default properties file for Management User

property.name: management_password
property.description: Password for the admin user of the management console. If not set, or if left as the default 'NOTAPASSWORD' there will be no admin user available.

property.name: service_user
property.description: the user under which jboss will run.

property.name: ip_address
property.description: Public ip address JBoss will bind to. 0.0.0.0 implies any ip address.

property.name: ip_address_management
property.description: Management ip address JBoss will bind to. 0.0.0.0 implies any ip address which. This is not recommended for the management services.

property.name: JAVA_HOME
property.description: Where to look for java to set JAVA_HOME. Needs to be a java 1.7 version.

property.name: http_port
property.description: http port

property.name: https_port
property.description: https port

property.name: management_native_port
property.description: native port for the management interface

property.name: management_http_port
property.description: http port for the management interface

property.name: management_https_port
property.description: https port for the management interface

property.name: ajp_port
property.description: Apache JServ Protocol port

property.name: osgi_http_port
property.description: OSGi http port

property.name: remoting_port
property.description: remoting port

property.name: txn_recovery_environment_port
property.description: txn recovery environment port

property.name: txn_status_manager_port
property.description: txn status manager port

property.name: mail_server
property.description: Address of the default mail server. Localhost used by default.

property.name: mail_port
property.description: Port of the default mail server
